pkgmetadata.longdescription: Liu Regression with Liu Biasing Parameters and Statistics // Linear Liu regression coefficient's estimation and testing with different Liu related measures such as MSE, R-squared etc. REFERENCES i. Akdeniz and Kaciranlar (1995) doi:10.1080/03610929508831585 ii. Druilhet and Mom (2008) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2006.06.011 iii. Imdadullah, Aslam, and Saima (2017) iv. Liu (1993) doi:10.1080/03610929308831027 v. Liu (2001) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2010.05.030.
